name: Remove-Widgets
commandPattern: Get-AppxPackage *WebExperience* | Remove-AppxPackage -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; New-Item -Path 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced' -Force | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced' -Name 'TaskbarDa' -Type DWord -Value 0
